thread.title_full: Love Energy Savings reviewed by Martin Davis

author: Martin Davis
title: Martin Davis
text: I spoke with Leeann who was personable and able to answer all my queries. She found us some competitive prices but this is ahead of our formal renewal. I was able to lock this price 4 months ahead of my current end of contract so effectively fixing my price for 40 months. Based on their promise of £1000 cash back if renewal prices are cheaper it made sense to use their expertise. Moreover, the £30 kick-back per utility for being referred by Martin Lewis will come in handy - we are a charity after all!
